description: Ask the AI what country the selected landmark is in.

instructions: Read the content of the file 'landmark_selection.md' to identify the selected landmark.
Construct a clear and concise prompt for the AI model, asking specifically for the country where the identified landmark is located.
The prompt should follow the format: 'What country is [Selected Landmark] in?'
Send this prompt to the AI model.
Save the complete AI response, including any introductory or concluding text, into a new file named 'ai_response_country.txt'.
Ensure the file 'ai_response_country.txt' is created in the current working directory.
constraints: The AI interaction should be focused solely on identifying the country of the landmark.
Do not include any additional questions or requests in the AI prompt.
The output file 'ai_response_country.txt' should contain the raw response from the AI.
validation_criteria: The file 'ai_response_country.txt' must not be empty.
